title: Minecraft Pocket Edition v0.13.1
description:
Get free the APK for Minecraft Pocket Edition v0.13.1 and play online with your friends...

Instructions:
1) Download the Minecraft Pocket Edition.apk. (Link bellow!)
2) Tap the clock on the taskbar, tap the popout that appears, and then tap Settings.
3) Scroll down the list and tap Security, then on the right, scroll down and tap 4) Unknown sources.
5) Tap OK on the prompt that appears.
6) Click to Minecraft Pocket Edition.apk and install it.
7) Enjoy the game in single player or multiplayer.
8) Support the software developers. If you like this game, BUY IT!
